# absolute(_:)

**Type Method**

Creates a dimension with an absolute point value.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func absolute(_ absoluteDimension: CGFloat) -> Self
```

## Creating a dimension

- **estimated(_:)**: Creates a dimension with an estimated point value.
- **fractionalHeight(_:)**: Creates a dimension that is computed as a fraction of the height of the containing group.
- **fractionalWidth(_:)**: Creates a dimension that is computed as a fraction of the width of the containing group.
- **uniformAcrossSiblings(estimate:)**: Creates a dimension in which each item receives as much room as it requires and grows to match the dimension of its largest sibling.
